about.title: Laureano Iglesias
about.subtitle: Full Stack developer with +2 years of experience in startups. Ability to adapt in dynamic environments, ease and efficiency in teamwork, and willingness to learn.

content.title: Full Stack Developer SSR
tasks: Implementation of automated processes with AI to optimize internal workflows.
Development of advanced PDF reports with dynamic templates and personalized data.
Comprehensive frontend improvement, including responsive design and UX/UI optimization.
Stack: React, Vue, NestJS, MongoDB, MySQL, AWS.

content.title: Full Stack Developer
tasks: Development of features to improve user experience in a SaaS platform for appointment management via WhatsApp.
Technical support and critical bug resolution.
Stack: Ruby on Rails, Redis, PostgreSQL.

content.title: Full Stack Developer
tasks: Integration of AI APIs for audio transcription.
Development of a usability testing creation system based on Figma wireframes and drag & drop components.
Firestore optimization to reduce storage costs.

content.title: Typing Game
content.description: Simple game using only Vanilla JS, to improve logical thinking and typing speed. Stack: HTML, CSS, JS

content.title: World-app
content.description: CRUD with countries API, displays basic stats and activities. Filtering, sorting, searching, and creation of new activities. Stack: PERN

content.title: Ecommerce-videogames
content.description: Ecommerce with authentication, local/Google registration, guest mode, shopping cart, Mercado Pago Checkout/PayPal, admin dashboard for user management, bans, sales, and comments, along with a mailing system. Stack: Node.js, Express, Auth0, NodeMailer, React, Redux, Bootstrap, Postgres
